   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Pywizard
**************************************

Pywizard is tool for automation of routine tasks of server configuration. It allows you to describe your server requirements in pure python.

.. note::
    This docs are at realy early stage of development (pywizard itself also). And will be gradualy improved in nearest time.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   api
   cmd_pywizard
